Name: Lodventure
About the game: Embark on a 1-4 Players Co-op survival adventure in search of a myth called the Lod Stone. Discover resources and build your house. Fight the keepers of the regions with the most suitable equipment for you and move on to the next region to become stronger. With the help of your special skills that you have discovered only just now, show your presence in this search for the mysterious Lod Stone. ROADMAP Key Features 1-4 Co-op Embark on this search for the mythic Lod stone alone or with your fellow treasure hunters. Base Build your own house and craft your items. Dungeons Go into dungeon expeditions for better equipments and materials. Keepers Slay the keepers of the region to move on to the next region and uncover the mysteries of the Lod stone.
Meta Title: Lodventure: Dec 12, 2022, Sky Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lodventure? Check out the release date (Dec 12, 2022), developer insights from Sky Games, and a complete game summary.
